thread.title: Mr Suffolk

author: Mr Suffolk
title: Mr Suffolk
text:
Returned home on Sunday night to to find I had a flat.
Booked Monday morning, open time slot for Wednesday (so that the booking didnt cost me as I was only having 1 tyre fitted)
As promised, received an email at 7am on Wednesday to confirm time slot, 12:35-2:35pm
Fitter arrived bang on 12:35, and was finished by 12:50! Great service, excellent efficient work
Thank you
